comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/27331537@N06]  This was the second locomotive of the NSW Railways to bear No 51. Entered service on 22 December 1891, and sold to the South Maitland Railway Company on 4 September 1919. Travelled 330,511 miles as part of the NSWGR fleet. Built by Beyer Peacock and Company  B/N 3335
